languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} heals an ally, that ally gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks up to a maximum of +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастер-тактик{/g} лечит союзника, этот союзник получает +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется вплоть до максимального значения, равного {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Tactician heals an ally, that ally gains +1 Resolve until the end of combat. This effect stacks up to a maximum of +<u>the Tactician's FEL bonus</u>.
Whenever the Tactician heals an ally, that ally gains +1 Resolve until the end of combat. This effect stacks up to a maximum of +<u>the Tactician's FEL bonus</u>.
Whenever the Tactician heals an ally, that ally gains +1 resolve until the end of combat. This effect stacks up to a maximum of +<u>the Tactician's FEL bonus</u>.

Whenever the Tactician heals an ally, that ally gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} stacks up to a maximum of +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} heals an ally, that ally gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks up to a maximum of +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастер-тактик{/g} лечит союзника, этот союзник получает +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется вплоть до максимального значения, равного {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} heals an ally, that ally gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks up to a maximum of +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: Когда тактик лечит союзника, этот союзник получает +1 к решимости до конца боя. Эффект суммируется вплоть до максимального значения, равного <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ОБЩ тактика</u>.
Когда тактик лечит союзника, этот союзник получает +1 к решимости до конца боя. Эффект суммируется вплоть до максимального значения, равного <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ОБЩ тактика</u>.
Когда тактик лечит союзника, этот союзник получает +1 к решимости до конца боя. Эффект суммируется вплоть до максимального значения, равного {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}治疗盟友时，该盟友都会获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果最多可以提供+{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}加值。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} heals an ally, that ally gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks up to a maximum of +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: 每当战术专家治疗盟友时，该盟友都会获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果带来的加值无法超过<u>战术专家的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。
每当战术专家治疗盟友时，该盟友都会获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果带来的加值无法超过{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}。

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} cure a un aliado, ese aliado gana +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} hasta el final del combate. Este efecto puede acumularse como máximo hasta +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} heals an ally, that ally gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks up to a maximum of +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} cure a un aliado, ese aliado gana +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} hasta el final del combate. Este efecto puede acumularse como máximo hasta +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

Cada vez que el táctico cure a un aliado, ese aliado gana +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}brío{/g} hasta el final del combate. Este efecto puede acumularse como máximo hasta +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} einen Verbündeten heilt, erlangt dieser Verbündete bis zum Ende des Kampfes +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}. Dieser Effekt stapelt sich bis maximal +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} heals an ally, that ally gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks up to a maximum of +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} einen Verbündeten heilt, erlangt dieser Verbündete bis zum Ende des Kampfes +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}. Dieser Effekt stapelt sich bis maximal +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

Wann immer der Taktiker einen Verbündeten heilt, erlangt dieser Verbündete bis zum Ende des Kampfes +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}. Dieser Effekt stapelt sich bis maximal +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g} soigne un allié, ce dernier bénéficie de +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cet effet est cumulable jusqu'à un maximum de +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} heals an ally, that ally gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks up to a maximum of +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le Tacticien soigne un allié, cet allié bénéficie de +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cet effet est cumulable jusqu'à un maximum de +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} du Tacticien</u>.

Chaque fois que le Tacticien soigne un allié, cet allié bénéficie de +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cet effet est cumulable jusqu'à un maximum de +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}が味方を回復した時、その味方は戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が+1される。この効果は最大で+{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}まで累積する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} heals an ally, that ally gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks up to a maximum of +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: 戦術家が味方を回復した時、その味方は戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が+1される。この効果は最大で<u>戦術家の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>まで累積する。
戦術家が味方を回復した時、その味方は戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が+1される。この効果は最大で<u>戦術家の{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}まで累積する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Usta Taktisyen{/g}, bir dost birimi iyileştirme, iyileştirdiğinde o dost birim +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} kazanır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki, maksimum +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} kadar üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} heals an ally, that ally gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks up to a maximum of +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.
